Work Experience

Firmware Developer (September - December 2011)

  • Implemented the SMS Replacement feature, as defined by the 3GPP specifications, using Python
  • Optimized the Call Logs engine by implementing Call Logs notification using Python
  • Implemented the Missed Call Notifications for BBX/BB10 Phones in Python
